headline: Zaslav 🤑💸 Gekko-WRECKS Warner Bros NIGHTMARE 💥🎥🔥
text:
Hollywood's TINSLETOWN 😩🎭 is FLIPPING UPSIDE DOWN 🤸‍♂️💥 over Warner Bros' APOCALYPSE 🧟‍♂️📉 – once the KING 👑 of CASABLANCA 🌴💋, GOODFELLAS 🔫🍝, BATMAN 🦇🦹‍♂️ and HARRY POTTER 🧹⚡ bangers, now a HOT MESS 🔥🍑 up for grabs by NETFLIX STREAM SLAYERS 📱💦 or PARAMOUNT SKYDANCE TRUMP SIMPS 🤡🇺🇸! Dozens of ACTORS 🎭😢, PRODUCERS 📽️🔥 and CAMERA CUCKS 📸🐔 spilling TEA ☕ to BBC: it's a DISASTER 🚨 CATSTROPHE 🌪️ NIGHTMARE 😱💤 choosing lesser EVIL between TECH KILLERS 🖥️💀 who MURDERED THEATERS 🎦🪦 (Netflix) or RIGHT-WING BILLIONAIRE TRUMPER DADDIES 👨‍💼🍆 like David Ellison 🤑🦅, son of ORACLE OVERLORD Larry Ellison 👴💰 – Trump's BFF 🤝🍊!

Netflix eyeing CROWN JEWELS 👑💎 – 102-YR-OLD STUDIO 🏛️🎥, HBO 🔥📺 and FAT ARCHIVE 📼🍑 of LEGENDS, dumping CNN 📰😤, TNT SPORTS 🏀⚽ and Discovery for scraps! Paramount Skydance DROPPING $108BN HOSTILE BEEF 💣📈 backed by SAUDI 💰🏜️, ABU DHABI 🕌🤑, QATAR 🐪💸 and JARED KUSHNER'S FUND 🤵‍♂️🍊 (Trump's SON-IN-LAW CLOWN 🤡👰)! CENSORSHIP FEARS 🚫🗣️ spiking, Trump fanning FLAMES 🔥 tweeting 'SELL CNN OR ELSE ‼️' – GHISLAINE VIBES? 👀🛌

POST-PANDEMIC HOLLYWOOD BLOODBATH 🩸🎬: 2023 STRIKES 🪧😡 halted EVERYTHING 🚫📺, 2022 was CREATIVE ORGY 💦👯‍♂️ but BOOM BUSTED 📉😭! Skydance SWALLOWED Paramount 👅🍑 earlier, AXING THOUSANDS 👷‍♂️💀. Warner hung FOR SALE 🏷️🔥, Netflix snagged TENTATIVE DEAL 🤝📱 but SALTY Paramount went DIRECT to SHAREHOLDERS 📊😡 with 'SUPERIOR' OFFER 🤑📈!

VILLAIN ARC UNLOCKED 🦹‍♂️: CEO DAVID ZASLAV 💰🐍 – $51.9M PAYDAY 🤑 while WB LOST $11BN 💸📉 and STOCK TANKED 7% 😱! Actors HOMELESS 😢🏠❌ blaming GORDON GEKKO 2.0 🤑🕶️ 'GREED IS GOOD' from WALL STREET 💼📈 – 'He RAN IT INTO THE GROUND ⛏️🌋 and SOLD THE PIECES 🍆🔪!' Producer RAGING: 'Broke it, flipped it, history? WHO CARES 😂💸!' Zaslav's MERGER MERDE 🤮 with Discovery+AT&T axed THOUSANDS 👥💀 but padded his POCKETS 🍑🤑. WB CLAPS BACK 📣: 'We SLAYED with DC UNIVERSE 🦸‍♂️🔥 10-YR PLAN, GLOBAL MAX PROFITABLE 💰🌍!'

CREATIVES CRYING 😭📽️: HOMELLESS ACTOR 🏚️🍑 with WIFE+KIDS 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 relying on FOOD BANKS 🥫😢 prefers Netflix over 'FOREIGN MONEY 🤑🌍' but exhibitors SCREAM 'DISASTER! 🎦💀 Netflix KILLED THEATERS 🪦📱!' Producers PLEAD: 'Paramount LOVES BIG SCREEN 🌟🍿!' Netflix SIMPS: 'We'll KEEP THEATERS + EGYPTIAN THEATRE GLOW-UP 💅🏛️ $70M MAKEOVER since 1922 ROBIN HOOD PREMIERE 🏹🎥!' Sound tech HOPES: 'STREAMING IS KING 👑📱!'

BACKLOT VIBES 🏰📸: TOURISTS SELFIE AT FRIENDS CENTRAL PERK ☕😍, but INSIDE? WRITERS ROOMS GHOST TOWN 👻🖥️. Producer SHRUGS 🤷‍♂️: '7 MERGERS DEEP 😵, MAKE GOOD SHIT 📺🔥 and SURVIVE!' Jokes ELON MUSK 🚀🐦 could TRILLIONAIRE SNIPE 🤑💥 – 'NO RULES WHEN YOU'RE RICHEST DADDY 👑🍆!' AI LOOMING 🤖😨, JOBS VANISHING 👻💼, Hollywood PRAYING 🙏 for LESSER EVIL in this EPIC BATTLE ROYALE 🎮⚔️ – WHO YA GOT? NETFLIX STREAM DOM 👑📱 or TRUMP PARAMOUNT PALS 🤝🍊? POPCORN READY 🍿😩‼️
